Whatevertown

2017
Freelance

Whatevertown is a podcast I co-host with friends. It’s a silly show, but it’s pushed me creatively, not just on mic, but with accompanying art and music as well. I’ve been able to experiment with still graphics, motion graphics, and 3D rendering.

Works End. Thank You.
